title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V1p1beta1\UpdatePhraseSetRequest
name: UpdatePhraseSetRequest
description:
Message sent by the client for the UpdatePhraseSet method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v1p1beta1.UpdatePhraseSetRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.phrase_set
params.description: Required. The phrase set to update. The phrase set's name field is used to identify the set to be updated. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/phraseSets/{phrase_set} Speech-to-Text supports three locations: global, us (US North America), and eu (Europe). If you are calling the speech.googleapis.com endpoint, use the global location. To specify a region, use a regional endpoint with matching us or eu location value.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: The list of fields to be updated.
